participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, I love expressing myself through music and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I lost everything when the economy crashed. I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories. I recently moved to Florida. I really enjoy hiking. I am not married, but I love planning weddings.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reflective and hopeful, I find comfort in nostalgia and seek growth in my personal relationships.
participant_2.background: I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time. I'm almost finished with my degree. I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that. I am quite short, only five foot four. My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, too. Just moved to Florida last week, and I'm still getting settled in.
Oh, that's exciting! I've always wanted to move to Florida.
It's been a lot of fun so far! I'm really enjoying the weather.
I bet! I'm not too big of a fan of the cold weather, so I'm sure I would love it there.
Yeah, it's definitely a lot warmer here than it is up north.
I'm from New York, so I'm used to the cold weather. But I'm ready for a change.
I'm sure you'll love it here. There's so much to do and see.
I'm excited to explore! I've heard there are some great hiking trails.
Yes, there are! I've been hiking a few times since I moved here, and it's been really nice.
That's great! I'm definitely going to have to check that out.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and see some beautiful scenery.
I'm sure I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
